author: Jasmin Sahota For Mailonline
title: Winnie Harlow parties at LOVE x Burberry LFW bash | Daily Mail Online
text: Buy now All eyes on her: Winnie looked every inch the supermodel as she showed off her statuesque figure in a tiny satin pink skirt, which perfectly accentuated her endlessly long and lean legs Model behaviour: Winnie was joined by the likes of Bella Hadid, 20, Jourdan Dunn, 26, and Kendall Jenner, 21, who were all enjoying their brief stint in the capital for Fashion Week Inside the event, the beauty looked like she was having the time of her life as she partied the night away with the next generation of modelling royalty. Winnie was joined by the likes of Bella Hadid, 20, Jourdan Dunn, 26, and Kendall Jenner, 21, who were all enjoying their brief stint in the capital. The beauty's outing comes just days after she was spotted getting rather close to fellow Canadain star Drake. The Hotline Bling hitmaker, who is currently in London on his The Boy Meets World tour, joined the model in Libertine nightclub over the weekend. City chic: Adding inches to her statuesque frame, the Canadian charmer teetered on sky-high platform latex boots Famous pals: Inside the event, the beauty looked like she was having the time of her life as she partied the night away with the next generation of modelling royalty Leggy lady: Winnie wrapped her perfect pins around British singer Ellie Goulding A source told The Sun newspaper: 'Drake only had eyes for Winnie. The pair were spotted chatting and dancing together at the party that went on until the early hours. Earlier in the night, Winnie enjoyed a girls' night out with fellow model Kendall Jenner at Cirque Le Soir, but quickly darted across the capital to join the rapper. 'Drake regularly parties at Libertine and had only extended the invite to his closest pals,' the source continued. 'Winnie and Drake have always had a close friendship, with him even rapping about her on track Know Yourself, but they looked particularly intimate on Saturday.' Winnie was also recently linked to Formula One driver Lewis Hamilton, 32, while Drake enjoyed a brief romance with Jennifer Lopez, 47. Hotline fling?
